title: Finally finished my Snow Day Bard drawing today!

embed.description: Find More Art Daily Deviations Critiques Critiqueable Wallpaper Random Random Deviant Random Deviation Random Group

body:
Bard is so fun to play and this skin makes him look so cozy and warm <3
Let me know what you guys think!

replies.body: Ahhh, he's so cute! I peeked your dA - seeing your WIP pieces was awesome. Awesome job! ^-^
